name: pareto-api
description: the API interface definitions for the pareto package

scripts.buildLintAndTest: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.validatePublishReadiness: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && npm run buildLintAndTest
scripts.pubMajor: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version major && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubMinor: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.test: echo there is nothing to test, this package only defines an API
